snippet: Islamist militants stormed police stations in several cities of Iraq’s restive western province of Anbar on Wednesday, seizing weapon caches and freeing prisoners after security forces dismantled a Sunni protest camp on Monday.
abstract: Islamist militants storm police stations in several cities of Iraq’s restive western province of Anbar, seizing weapon caches and freeing prisoners after security forces dismantled a Sunni protest camp.
lead_paragraph: Islamist militants stormed police stations in several cities of Iraq’s restive western province of Anbar on Wednesday, seizing weapon caches and freeing prisoners after security forces dismantled a Sunni protest camp on Monday.

headline.main: Iraq: Police Stations in Anbar Attacked
headline.print_headline: Iraq: Police Stations in Anbar Attacked
